entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Dunchurch
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:07 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 5:00 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -13.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: -17.6°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
